Name: Shortcutter
Author: Kezyma
Description: Shortcutter gives you the option of quickly creating instance and profile specific desktop shortcuts. Quickly launch your favourite games with your favourite mods in one click without switching in Mod Organizer!

ReleaseNotes: (1.0.4) Added basic support for Mod Organizer 2 v2.5.0
(1.0.5) Fix for a bug when Shortcutter is located at a path with spaces in it.
(1.0.6) Fix for Shortcutter getting sent to the back when creating a shortcut.
